Issue.creator: justatad
Issue.summary: Unable to start cluster of 2 validators and 2 transaction processors
Issue.environment: I am running my Vagrant environment on OS X Sierra
Issue.description: main() File "/project/sawtooth-core/validator/sawtooth_validator/server/cli.py", line 65, in main validator.stop() File "/project/sawtooth-core/validator/sawtooth_validator/server/core.py", line 227, in stop self._network.stop() File "/project/sawtooth-core/validator/sawtooth_validator/networking/interconnect.py", line 191, in stop self._thread.join() AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'join' Cannot have a genesis_batch_file and join an existing network Exception in thread Thread-5: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/lib/python3.5/threading.py", line 914, in _bootstrap_inner self.run() File "/usr/lib/python3.5/threading.py", line 862, in run self._target(*self._args, **self._kwargs) File "/project/sawtooth-core/validator/sawtooth_validator/networking/interconnect.py", line 128, in setup self._socket.bind(self._address) File "zmq/backend/cython/socket.pyx", line 487, in zmq.backend.cython.socket.Socket.bind (zmq/backend/cython/socket.c:5156) File "zmq/backend/cython/checkrc.pxd", line 25, in zmq.backend.cython.checkrc._check_rc (zmq/backend/cython/socket.c:7535) zmq.error.ZMQError: Invalid argument Traceback (most recent call last): File "/project/sawtooth-core/bin/validator", line 37, in main() File "/project/sawtooth-core/validator/sawtooth_validator/server/cli.py", line 65, in main validator.stop() File "/project/sawtooth-core/validator/sawtooth_validator/server/core.py", line 227, in stop self._network.stop() File "/project/sawtooth-core/validator/sawtooth_validator/networking/interconnect.py", line 191, in stop self._thread.join() AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'join' >
